title: Possible Criminal Charges in Deadly Houston Concert
itunes:title: Possible Criminal Charges in Deadly Houston Concert
description:
Rachel Fiset, managing partner of Zweiback, Fiset & Coleman, discusses the potential criminal and civil legal actions from the deadly Travis Scott concert.

Bryant Gardner, a partner at Winston & Strawn, discusses the legal fallout from the supply chain crisis.

Shyam Balganesh, a professor at Columbia Law School, discusses Supreme Court arguments in which Unicolors claimed that the Ninth Circuit wrongly nixed a copyright infringement win against designer H&M.

June Grasso hosts.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
